remarks: Value of the Yoneda embedding at a morphism.  The partially evaluated Yoneda embedding is also the contravariant Hom functor.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jan-2017.)
statement:
yon11.y $e |- Y = ( Yon ` C ) $.
yon11.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
yon11.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
yon11.p $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
yon11.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
yon11.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
yon12.x $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
yon12.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. B ) $.
yon12.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( W H Z ) ) $.
yon12.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Z H X ) ) $.
yon12 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( Z ( 2nd ` ( ( 1st ` Y ) ` X ) ) W ) ` F ) ` G ) = ( G ( <. W , Z >. .x. X ) F ) ) $.
